content: I'm not that serious usually, instead I try to be approachable. {A心虚目移}Mmmooo? I try to show them, through my gaze, that I'm not fishing with bad intentions, just for food, moo.

content: The fish I caught today have such shiny scales. Imagine them as decorations on a hat... HMM! Magnificent.
